name: RexSoft
tagline: We design, develop and launch web & mobile apps
description:
RexSoft is a digital production agency. Since 2012 we work in partnership with brands, tech startups and agencies to bring stunning products to life.
Our in-house production team of UX/UI designers, developers and project managers keeps development at the highest standard level and finds unique approach to every product. 
Being experts in web and mobile, we mix modern technologies, digital craftsmanship and professional approach to create beautiful and functional products. We love what we do, challenges motivate us and clients’ success inspires us.
